name: bernazolee's Run Bear
description:
bernazolee's Run Bear Controls

You can move around the menu with Up/Down arrow keys and select a menu item or channge an option with X or Z.

You can move the bear around with the Left/Right arrow keys to run, X or Z to jump.

Rules

Keep the bear above the swarm of angry bees by jumping from platform to platform. Be careful with the ice covered platforms, landing too fast you might make you unable to stop from sliding over the edge.  And don't leave the screen on either side, you will fall down the mountain.

From time to time some of the bees will try and attack, don't get stung.

The game ends with victory when the bear reaches a hight the bees can't risk entering, this height depends on the difficulty chosen in the Options menu.

Behind the Scenes

The first ever game I finished. :)

I wanted to submi it to Crunchy Jam, but ran out of time as I couldn't finish even the simplest version in 4 hours. When I realized I won't be able to finsish it I added a couple of things, like menu, levels, and high score, and refactored the code (twice, actually).  

Credits

Code, graphics, sfx, and music (except for the Irish folk song the "Wild rover") was all made by me. 

You can find me on Twitter.

Have fun!
